#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
int main () {
	int n; int q; cin >> n; cin >> q;
	string s;
	vector < int > v;
	v.resize(n+1);
	for (int i=1; i<=n; i++) {
		int temp; cin >> temp;
		v[i] = temp;
	}
	while (q--) {
		cin >> s;
		long long ans = 0;
		int a, b;
		cin >> a >> b;
		for (int i=a; i<=b; i++)
			ans = ans + v[i];
		cout << ans << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
